original_text: While one of them was cutting down a tree, his iron axe fell into the water. He shouted, ‘Oh! My master! The axe did not belong to me!’
korean_text: 한 사람이 나무를 벨 때에 쇠도끼가 물에 떨어진지라 이에 외쳐 이르되 아아, 내 주여 이는 빌려온 것이니이다 하니

sentences.original_text: While one of them was cutting down a tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 한 사람이 나무를 베고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: his iron axe fell into the water
The axe did not belong to me
